00023 
00024 #ifndef generique_inclus
00025 
00026 #define generique_inclus
00027 
00028 /* macros to paste tokens together to form new names */
00029 /* 4.2BSD and System V cpp's have different mechanisms for
00030    pasting tokens together, but 4.3BSD agrees with System V.
00031    ANSI C has defined a new way.
00032 */
00033 
00034 #if defined(__STDC__) || defined (__STDCPP__) || defined (MICROSOFT)
00035 /* ANSI C preprocessors will not expand the arguments to a macro;
00036  * so we need to add a level of indirection to allow macro expansion of
00037  * arguments.  (Reiser preprocessors allowed the first arg to be expanded;
00038  * this method will allow both to be expanded, which is better than none.)
00039  */
00040 #define name2(a,b)      _name2_aux(a,b)
00041 #define _name2_aux(a,b)      a##b
00042 #define name3(a,b,c)    _name3_aux(a,b,c)
00043 #define _name3_aux(a,b,c)    a##b##c
00044 #define name4(a,b,c,d)  _name4_aux(a,b,c,d)
00045 #define _name4_aux(a,b,c,d)  a##b##c##d
00046 
00047 #else
00048 
00049 #ifdef pyr
00050 /*
00051  * Pyramid run SVR3, but its cpp uses the BSD4.2 version of argument pasting
00052  */
00053 #define name2(a,b) a                                \
00054   b
00055 #define name3(a,b,c) a                                \
00056   b                                                \
00057   c
00058 #define name4(a,b,c,d) a                        \
00059   b                                                \
00060   c                                                \
00061   d
00062 #else
00063 /*
00064  * Most non-ANSI cpps use the "null comment" method
00065  */
00066 #define name2(a,b)        a/**/b
00067 #define name3(a,b,c)        a/**/b/**/c
00068 #define name4(a,b,c,d)        a/**/b/**/c/**/d
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 #define declare(a,t) name2(declare_,a)(t)
00074 #define implemente(a,t) name2(implemente_,a)(t)
00075 
00076 // GF nouvelle macro pour fabriquer des vrais noms pour les listes, les Deriv, les Ref,
00077 #ifdef _COMPILE_AVEC_GCC_
00078 #define string_macro_trio(a,b) _inter_name(b)
00079 #define _inter_name(a) #a
00080 #else
00081 #define string_macro_trio(a,b) a
00082 #endif
00083 #endif
00084
